movies.Title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
movies.Plot: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion ar...

movies.Title: Moana
movies.Plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

movies.Title: The Breakfast Club
movies.Plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

movies.Title: For a Few Dollars More
movies.Plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.

movies.Title: Dirty Harry
movies.Plot: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

movies.Title: The Color Purple
movies.Plot: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

movies.Title: Joker
movies.Plot: The rise of Arthur Fleck, from aspiring stand-up comedian and pariah to Gotham's clown prince and leader of the revolution.

movies.Title: Spider-Man
movies.Plot: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.
